metadata.purpose: Shared prompts and rubrics for cross-AI grading in Gy25 Svenska/SvA and Engelska

prompts.text: Write a 300-500 word argumentative text on AI’s role in Swedish education, with källkritik of 2 digital sources (e.g., UR Play). Adapt to teachers.
Analyze a Nordic literary text vs. AI-generated version (500-800 words); discuss retorik, bias, språkvariation (SvA: include minority language).
Write an 800-1200 word scientific essay on language identity in digital media, with källkritik, ethical reflection, minority language proposals.

rubric.Språkriktighet & Retorik: Nuanced, audience-adapted, sophisticated retorik (tes, motargument, stilmedel).
rubric.Källkritik & Analys: Deep source critique; handles bias/etik; SvA: minority equity.
rubric.Innehåll & Reflektion: Comprehensive theme understanding; innovative insights; SvA: flerspråkig equity.

prompts.text: Write a 300-500 word argumentative essay on AI in global education, with source criticism of 2 online sources. Adapt to peers.
Analyze a literary text (English-speaking culture) vs. AI-generated version (500-800 words); discuss rhetoric, bias, language variations.
Write an 800-1200 word scientific essay on language identity in digital media, with critical reflection, ethical considerations, cross-cultural links.

rubric.Critical Analysis & Sources: In-depth source critique; handles bias/ethics; cultural nuances.
